de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.im

Class ImvAdapterIetf

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.im.ImvAdapterIetf
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImAdapter<ImvConnectionAdapter>, ImvAdapter

     class ImvAdapterIetf
extends Object
implements ImvAdapter
    IMV adapter adapting an IMV according to IETF/TCG specifications.
